name: Spellbound (itch) (2bitchuck)
description:
This is a feature light demake of the Atari 2600 game Word Zapper created for TweetTweetJam 5! Shoot the letters to spell the given words before the clock runs out. The faster you finish the words, the more points you get!

Controls: L/R arrows to move your cannon left and right. X to fire, Z to backspace.
